TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PackageDigitalSignatureManager extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a utility class for the creation and verification of digital signatures in a .

span.span: Provides a utility class for the creation and verification of digital signatures in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數位簽章類別和執行一般工作中使用的數位簽章提供公用程式類別的.NET framework 架構上建置項目。 builds on the architecture of .NET Framework digital signature classes and provides a utility class for performing common tasks in using digital signatures with elements. 如需封裝的數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章： 數位簽章的架構，可在開放式封裝慣例的[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Packaging.Package package) cil managed

param.name: package
param.span: The package associated with this signature manager.

span.span: The package associated with this signature manager.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for use with a specified .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for use with a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目標封裝相關聯的簽章管理員會在初始化期間設定。The target package associated with the signature manager is set during initialization. 設定之後，就無法變更與簽章管理員相關聯的套件。After it is set, the package associated with the signature manager cannot be changed. 視需要建立新的簽章的每個封裝管理員。Create a new signature manager for each package as needed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example shows how to use this constructor. 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption CertificateOption { System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption get(); void set(System::IO::Packaging::CertificateEmbeddingOption value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the X.509 certificate embedding option used by the method to digitally sign package parts.

span.span: Gets or sets the X.509 certificate embedding option used by the method to digitally sign package parts.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定以數位方式簽署組件時，儲存簽署者的 X.509 憑證。This property specifies where the signer's X.509 certificate will be stored when digitally signing a part. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何數位簽署的組件在封裝內的準備工作中設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property in preparation to digitally sign the parts within a package. 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966).

summary.span: Countersigns signatures in the package with a specified X.509 certificate.

span.span: Countersigns signatures in the package with a specified X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Countersign() cil managed

summary.span: Countersigns all the signatures in the package with a user-selected X.509 certificate.

span.span: Countersigns all the signatures in the package with a user-selected X.509 certificate.

returns.span: The signature that was added as a countersign; or if no certificate could be located or the user canceled the certificate selection dialog.

span.span: The signature that was added as a countersign; or if no certificate could be located or the user canceled the certificate selection dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在呼叫中指定 X.509 憑證，則這個方法會開啟憑證選取對話方塊，提示使用者選擇要用於簽署的憑證。If no X.509 certificate is specified in the call, this method opens a certificate selection dialog box that prompts the user to choose a certificate to use for signing. 在中設定的視窗控制代碼屬性，然後再呼叫進行憑證選取對話方塊強制回應特定視窗。Set the window handle in the property before calling to make the Certificate Selection Dialog modal to the given window.

summary.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.

value.span: A [！識別用來建立及驗證簽章的預設雜湊演算法的 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 字串。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的預設雜湊演算法類別是([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/includes/tlasharptla-sha1-md.md)])。The default hash algorithm for the standard class is ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/includes/tlasharptla-sha1-md.md)]). 屬性取得或設定實際的雜湊演算法，這用來建立和驗證簽章。The property gets or sets the actual hash algorithm this is used to create and verify signatures. 屬性通常用來重設暫存的變更後的預設屬性。The property is typically used to reset the property back to default after a temporary change.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identifier for the instance used to create and verify signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的數位簽章管理員的預設雜湊演算法識別項是(-安全雜湊演算法 1.0 版)。The default hash algorithm identifier for the standard digital signature manager is (—Secure Hash Algorithm version 1.0). 否則，將此屬性設定明確取得相同的值，除非。Unless explicitly set otherwise, this property gets the same value as . 屬性通常不變更預設值。The property is typically not changed from its default. 必須變更這個屬性，才會使用不同的已知的簽章，而且可存取為止。This property must be changed only if a signature that uses a different known and accessible is encountered. 完成之後會使用不同的雜湊演算法的簽章，呼叫重設屬性設回預設值。When finished with the signature that uses a different hash algorithm, call to reset the property back to default.

exception.span: The string for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to set is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSigned As Boolean
public: property bool IsSigned { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the package contains any signatures.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the package contains any signatures.

value.span: 如果封裝包含簽章。否則， 。

span.span: if the package contains signatures; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會執行簽章驗證。The property does not perform signature validations. 如果沒有簽章和是`true`，一或多個簽章可能無效。If signatures are present and is `true`, one or more of the signatures might not be valid. 呼叫確認簽章有效，且未變更。Call to confirm that the signatures are valid and have not changed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷封裝是否包含數位簽章。The following example shows how to use the property to determine if a package contains digital signatures. 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). [!code-csharp[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/CSharp/PackageDigitalSignature.cs#packagedigsigvalidate)] [!code-vb[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/visualbasic/packagedigitalsignature.vb#packagedigsigvalidate)]

member this.ParentWindow : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a handle to the parent window for displaying a certificate selection dialog box.

span.span: Gets or sets a handle to the parent window for displaying a certificate selection dialog box.

value.span: 要用來顯示憑證選取對話方塊的父視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle of the parent window to use to display the certificate selection dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 憑證選取對話方塊會顯示只有當呼叫中包含任何憑證。A certificate selection dialog box is presented only if a call contains no certificates. 如果未不指定任何憑證，會顯示憑證選取對話方塊，可讓使用者選擇要用於簽署的憑證。If no certificates are specified, will display a certificate selection dialog box that enables the user to choose which certificate to use for signing.

summary.span: Removes all digital signatures from the package.

span.span: Removes all digital signatures from the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也會從封裝移除所有的 X.509 憑證。This method also removes all X.509 certificates from the package. 移除所有的簽章和憑證之後, 呼叫保存至存放區的所有變更。After removing all signatures and certificates, call to persist all changes to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它不由任何其他數位簽章參考，這個方法也會移除相關聯的 X.509 憑證。This method also removes the associated X.509 certificate if it is not referenced by any other digital signature. 移除簽章之後, 呼叫保存至存放區的變更。After removing a signature, call to persist the change to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parts`清單可以是空白或`null`如果`relationshipSelectors`包含至少一個項目。The `parts` list can be empty or `null` if `relationshipSelectors` contains at least one entry. `relationshipSelectors`清單可以是空白或`null`如果`parts`包含至少一個項目。The `relationshipSelectors` list can be empty or `null` if `parts` contains at least one entry. 之間`parts`清單和`relationshipSelectors`必須至少一個項目，來簽署。Between the `parts` list and `relationshipSelectors` there must be at least one element to sign. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以數位方式簽署封裝組件的清單。The following example shows how to digitally sign a list of package parts. 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see the [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). [!code-csharp[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigSign](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/CSharp/PackageDigitalSignature.cs#packagedigsigsign)] [!code-vb[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigSign](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/visualbasic/packagedigitalsignature.vb#packagedigsigsign)]

exception.span: Neither nor specify any elements to sign.

span.span: Neither nor specify any elements to sign.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Sign (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Uri> parts, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> relationshipSelectors, string signatureId, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> signatureObjects, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> objectReferences);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature Sign(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Uri> parts, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> relationshipSelectors, string signatureId, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> signatureObjects, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> objectReferences) cil managed

Public Function Sign (parts As IEnumerable(Of Uri), certificate As X509Certificate, relationshipSelectors As IEnumerable(Of PackageRelationshipSelector), signatureId As String, signatureObjects As IEnumerable(Of DataObject), objectReferences As IEnumerable(Of Reference)) As PackageDigitalSignature

public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageDigitalSignature ^ Sign(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Uri ^> ^ parts, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate ^ certificate, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationshipSelector ^> ^ relationshipSelectors, System::String ^ signatureId, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::DataObject ^> ^ signatureObjects, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::Reference ^> ^ objectReferences);

MemberSignature.Usage: packageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign (parts, certificate, relationshipSelectors, signatureId, signatureObjects, objectReferences)

param.name: parts
param.span: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the objects to sign.

span.span: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the objects to sign.

param.name: certificate
param.span: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.

span.span: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.

param.name: relationshipSelectors
param.span: The list of objects to sign.

param.name: signatureId

param.span: A list of references to custom objects to sign.

summary.span: Signs a list of package parts, package relationships, or custom objects with a specified X.509 certificate and signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

span.span: Signs a list of package parts, package relationships, or custom objects with a specified X.509 certificate and signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

returns.span: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the and lists.

span.span: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the and lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須至少一個項目，來登入`parts`， `relationshipSelectors`， `signatureObjects`，或`objectReferences`。There must be at least one element to sign in `parts`, `relationshipSelectors`, `signatureObjects`, or `objectReferences`. > [!NOTE] > 條款`Object`， `Manifest`， `Reference`， `SignatureProperties`，和`Transform`兩個註解下列項目類型和 W3C XML 簽章語法和處理規格所定義的標記是指，請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).The terms `Object`, `Manifest`, `Reference`, `SignatureProperties`, and `Transform` in the following two remarks refer to element types and tags defined by the W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing specification, see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). 這個和其他方法多載會使用目前字典，其中定義`Transform`套用根據 封裝組件。This and other method overloads use the current dictionary that defines a `Transform` to apply based on the package part . Microsoft 開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格目前允許只有兩個有效`Transform`演算法： C14 和 C14N。The Microsoft Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification currently allows only two valid `Transform` algorithms: C14 and C14N. W3C XML 簽章語法和處理標準不允許空白`Manifest`標記。The W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing standard does not allow empty `Manifest` tags. 開放式封裝慣例規格也需要-特定`Object`標記同時包含`Manifest`和`SignatureProperties`標記。Also the Open Packaging Conventions specification requires a -specific `Object` tag that contains both `Manifest` and `SignatureProperties` tags. 每個`Manifest`標記此外也包含至少一個`Reference`標記。Each `Manifest` tag additionally also include at least one `Reference` tag. 這些標記可讓您要求每個簽章簽署至少一個（非空白的組件已標記） 或(非空白`relationshipSelectors`) 即使只需簽章簽署`signatureObjects`或`objectReferences`。These tags require that each signature sign at least one (non-empty parts tag) or (non-empty `relationshipSelectors`) even if the signature is needed only to sign `signatureObjects` or `objectReferences`. 這方法就會忽略每個相關聯的屬性中定義`objectReferences`。This method ignores the property associated with each defined in `objectReferences`. 這多載提供支援的產生[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]需要自訂的簽章`Object`標記。This overload provides support for generation of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] signatures that require custom `Object` tags. 提供任何`Object`標記來簽署，相對應`Reference`標記必須與提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]指定`Object`本機片段語法中的標記。For any provided `Object` tag to be signed, a corresponding `Reference` tag must be provided with a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the `Object` tag in local fragment syntax. 例如如果`Object`標記有識別碼為 「 myObject 」，在 URI`Reference`標記會是"#myObject"。For example if the `Object` tag has an ID of "myObject", the URI in the `Reference` tag would be "#myObject". 針對不帶正負號的物件，不`Reference`需要。For unsigned objects, no `Reference` is required.

exception.span: is not and is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] schema ID (for example, begins with a leading numeric digit).

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]可能會因套件因為正式未定義的名稱。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] can vary by package because the name is not formally defined. 雖然這項實作通常會使用相同的預設值，這個屬性所傳回的值會反映任何來源已存在於目前。While this implementation will generally use the same default value, the value returned by this property will reflect whatever origin is already present in the current .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TimeFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TimeFormat : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the date/time format used to create a signature .

span.span: Gets or sets the date/time format used to create a signature .

value.span: 用來建立簽章的日期/時間格式。

span.span: The date/time format used to create a signature .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是"YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD"。The default is "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD". 日期/時間格式會根據在 「 W3C 日期和時間格式 」 規格的語法[ http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html ](http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html)。Date/time formats follow the syntax of the "W3C Date and Time Formats" specification at [http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html](http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html). 如下所示的元件必須存在，並使用的語法和所定義的標點符號。The components shown below must be present and use the syntax and punctuation as defined. |TimeFormatTimeFormat|描述Description|範例Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYYYYYY|YearYear|20052005| |YYYY MMYYYY-MM|年份和月份Year and month|2005-072005-07| |YYYY-MM-DDYYYY-MM-DD|完成日期Complete date|2005-07-282005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|完成日期加上小時和分鐘Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:002005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|完成日期加上小時、 分鐘和秒為單位Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|完成日期加上小時、 分鐘和含有十進位小數的秒數Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| 其中：where: ||| |-|-| |YYYYYYYY|四位數年份 (例如 2005)four-digit year (for example 2005)| |MMMM|兩位數月份 (01 = 年 1 月)two-digit month (01=January)| |DDDD|兩位數天數的月份 (01 到 31)two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |ThhThh|兩位數小時 (從 00 到 23、 24 小時制的時間)two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mmmm|兩位數的分鐘 (00 到 59)two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ssss|兩位數的秒鐘 (00 到 59)two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |秒s|一或多個代表第二個小數點後的幾位的數字one or more digits representing a decimal fracion of a second| |TZDTZD|時區指示項 (Z 或 + hh: mm 或-hh: mm)time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|

identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽署作業期間每個內容類型的相關聯的轉換演算法會先套用執行。During a sign operation the associated transform algorithm for each content type is applied before the is executed. 預設內容與轉換對應包括：Default content and transform mappings include: |內容Content|ContentTypeContentType|轉換演算法識別項Transform algorithm identifier| |-------------|-----------------|------------------------------------| |RelationshipRelationship|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.relationships+xml""application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.relationships+xml"|| |數位簽章Digital Signature|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.digital-signature-xmlsignature+xml""application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.digital-signature-xmlsignature+xml"||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證只數位簽章。它不會驗證相關的 X.509 憑證。This method verifies only the digital signatures; it does not verify the related X.509 certificates. 方法可用來驗證 X.509 憑證。The method can be used to verify the X.509 certificates. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來驗證在封裝內所有已簽署的組件。The following example shows how to use this method to validate all signed parts within a package. 如需完整範例，請參閱[建立數位簽章範例封裝](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966)。For the complete sample, see [Creating a Package with a Digital Signature Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159966). [!code-csharp[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/CSharp/PackageDigitalSignature.cs#packagedigsigvalidate)] [!code-vb[PackageDigitalSignature#PackageDigSigValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageDigitalSignature/visualbasic/packagedigitalsignature.vb#packagedigsigvalidate)]
